page.title: 09HOUSING IN CUMBERNAULD
page.content: {Cumbernauld}has a wide range of housing both public and private, most of the latter being in{Greenfaulds}and {Balloch. Types of house range from{Multi_Storey {Flats}to {Detached Bungalows.}The roadway system that keeps cars and pedestrians apart also divides the town into distinct areas, and within each there is a variety of houses. An attempt has been made to avoid isolating the{elderly}and houses are provided for senior citizens close to the home of people with{young families so that the groups can mix. Land between the houses has been{ {lanscaped}to provide areas of{open {space}with shrubberies and grass. Awards from the{Saltire Society}have been made for{Imaginitve Town {Planning. } { }
